column4: noob-question: can i un-root myself in terminal without closing the terminal
if you su'd to root you can just type 'exit'.  I think you can just 'su' to another user if you wish
what player?
xmms and beep media player
do you use esd as the sound output?
i dont know, where do i look that  up?
system  > preferences > multimedia systems selector
sink:esd, source:oss
go to preferences in xmms and beep and select esd as the audio output
thanks.. that did the trick:D
if the bin file is a virus, you throw it in the trash.  If the in file is something you want to run and you can't use synaptic to do it, you run it
:D
thanks, i knew i was supposed to run it, but i didnt know how :>
what is it a bin file of?
xmms-control desklet thingy
hmmm I don't know what you do with those.  To run a file you just go to the directory where it is located and do ./file though
./file didnt work.. "file" did tho.. replied "Install_XMMS_Sensor.bin: a python script text executable
I meant ./nameofthefileyouwanttorun
that worked better ;)
global, it changes every instance of dapper on a line instead of just the first instance
killall totem
that didnt work for me tho.. even with "sudo killall totem"
kill -9 it
